about.title:
let's
introduce about
myself
about.description:
I am a Frontend Developer with skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, TypeScript, and Angular 18. Currently, I am learning Angular 18 and developing projects to strengthen my expertise. I enjoy creating visually appealing and user-friendly web applications with clean and efficient code. Passionate about learning, I constantly explore new technologies and best practices to improve my development skills.
I am excited to collaborate on projects where I can apply my knowledge and grow as a developer. Let's build something great together!

projects.title: Weather App
projects.tech: Real time Weather App using HTML, CSS, Java Script and Weather Api

projects.title: Restaurant Website
projects.tech: Responsive Food Website using HTML ,CSS and Bootstrap

projects.title: News App
projects.tech: News App using HTML ,CSS ,Java Script and News Api
